## Description
The heating element is a thermofoil conductive&#10;&#9;&#9;electrical element embedded in a thin Kapton substrate.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Mass:|1.0 kg|
|Type:|Electrical|
